body.section: The following BPs are undergoing testing and enhancement at the time of writing..

entry.p: Loads and runs the default classifier on a RefSet.

It is important that the SNOMED refset is self-consistent with the SNOMED description logic and that it adheres to the specific concept model constraints and rules. Furthermore, the inferred view of the refset, denoting the derived relationships inherited from higher concepts of a given concept needs to be available during the modelling phase. Satisfying all the above requirements is enabled by running an appropriate classifier over the refset.
This process loads and runs the classifier and can be invoked manually (via button) by a modeller, as well as being available for autoprocessing.
Can be invoked through the SnoRocket Button.

LoadAndClassify.bpยง Under extensive development in conjunction with SnoRocket Classifier from The Australian E-Health Research Centre. Licensing conditions apply. ( contact available at http://e-hrc.net )ยง
